basics.name: Frances Uy
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science, Data Science Track, in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2025.

work.summary: Co-edit and produce weekly news show segments
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee weekly Digital Premieres
Working closely with Executive Producer within tight broadcast deadlines
Drive, design and edit deliverables for Instagram
Take complete, accurate, and organized notes for weekly Computer Science courses at UH Mānoa
Submit notes on a punctual and timely basis

volunteer.summary: Collaborative learning program for Artificial Intelligence
highlights: Developed an intensive research project on the ethical and societal impacts of algorithms in social media platforms based on the decisions of its users
Cohort of 90 undergraduate students recent Hawai‘i High School graduates
Honolulu Zoo and Kahala Nui Elderly Care Home

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.
